article_node.title: Release date announced for 'Landman' Season 2
article_node.summary: Season 2 of the Paramount+ series 'Landman,' co-created by Taylor Sheridan, is set to premiere on November 16, 2025. The show, which follows the oil industry's impact on West Texas, has gained significant popularity, attracting 35 million global viewers since its debut. The new season will explore the aftermath of a key character's death and introduce new dynamics within the M-Tex Oil company, featuring a mix of returning and new cast members.
